txt.en: 'Our endless legions have stood idly by while those sickening halflings prod at our lumber-camps and tree-felling to the south.  \n\n'It's time to tear the foundations from their weak homes. Charge in there and deliver the War-tyrant's message... and bring back their feet as proof that you did so. Remember, those who deliver the enemy to us will find favour in the master's eyes.'
'Just what we need. These will raise morale and probably make quite a stew, as well.'
'Where are those halfling-feet, you mangy slug!? Get back out there and FIGHT for your masters!'
The Hobbit-town of Hoarhallow has been a rallying point for attacks on the Grimwood lumber operations in the Ettenmoors.
Hoarhallow lies to the south of Gramsfoot.\n\nSoldier Búzog instructed to bring feet from the hobbits in Hoarhallow, securing your favour in the eyes of the War-tyrant.
Bring the hobbit-feet to Soldier Búzog
Soldier Búzog is at Gramsfoot in the Ettenmoors.\n\nYou should bring the hobbit-feet you collected to Soldier Búzog.
